import { Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import React, { useState } from 'react' import { connect } from "react-redux"; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import Input from "./Input"; import MultiSelect from "react-multi-select-component"; const FormInfo = (props) => { const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(); const [finDate, setFinDate] = useState(new Date('')); const [email,setEmail] = useState('') const [tel,setTel] = useState(''); const [organisme,setOrganisme] = useState(''); const [rep,setRep] = useState(''); const [encExterne,setEncExterne] = useState(''); const [description,setDescription] = useState(''); const [ville,setVille] = useState('') const [pays,setPays] = useState('') const [selectedProfs, setSelectedProfs] = useState([]); const options = [ { value: 'chocolate', label: 'Chocolate' }, { value: 'strawberry', label: 'Strawberry' }, { value: 'vanilla', label: 'Vanilla' } ] const formStyle = { // marginLeft: 250, // marginRight: 350, // border: "solid 1px", // boxShadow: "2px 2px", marginTop: "10px", marginBottom: "10px", // textAlign: "center", paddingTop: "10px", }; const submitButtonStyle = { margin: "20px", position: "relative", width: "200px", height: "50px", }; return (
setStartDate(date)} />
{setFinDate(date.toISOString().substring(0, 10)); console.log(finDate)}} />
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { isLoged: state.isLoged, userId: state.userId, userInfo: state.userInfo, }; }; // const mapDispatchToProps =(dispatch) =>{ // return{ // onLoginSucceed:(userid,userinfo)=> dispatch({type:actionTypes.LOGED,userid:userid,userinfo}) // } // } export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(FormInfo);
